title: The TCA 2021 Survey Results
itunes:title: The TCA 2021 Survey Results
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority Live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire.. SURVEY SAYS!  The Results are in for the 2021 TCA Listener Survey and we will share that information with you and you might be surprised by some of the answers, we know we were!

We also discuss the proper way to light and re-light a cigar. You might think you know how, but there are some steps many of us overlook on a regular basis.

Join us this week as we fire up the Trinidad Espiritu No. 2 along with a Plus 90 Cigar.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

As always you can find many of the cigars we smoke at https://www.2guyscigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
